text: Narapati was a Burmese royal title, and may refer to: ==Kings== * Sithu II: King of Burma, r. 1174–1211 * Narapati I of Ava: King of Ava, r. 1442–68 * Narapati II of Ava: King of Ava, r. 1501–27 * Narapati of Prome: King of Prome, r. 1532–39 * Narapati III of Ava: King of Ava, r. 1545–51 * Narapati IV of Ava: King of Ava, r. 1551–55 * Narapati of Mrauk-U: King of Arakan, r. 1638–45 ==Queens== * Narapati Medaw: Chief vicereine of Prome, r. 1551–88 Category:Burmese royal titles
title: Narapati
